title: Khazix needs a buff
body: rengar is way better than khazix and they are rivals lol, rengar can insta burst carries down and get away quite easy but khazix needs to risk his life to do so.

Khazix is still a pretty good champion, i just don't think he's a dominant jungler in the current Meta, i mean look at the current jungle Meta, you've got champions like Dr Mundo, Trundle, Rammus, Amumu and Lee Sin dominating the scene (But Lee has pretty much always been like that), these are all pretty tanky champions that regardless of whether they're fed or not still have a pretty significant impact on the game, the only really strong squishy champions i frequently see in the jungle are Rengar, Kindred and Shaco, but the one thing almost all squishy junglers have in common is the fact that they have to have a major impact in the early game to actually excel throughout the rest of the game, i don't think Khazix needs a buff i think it's just the current Meta that's making him look a bit weak.
